name: Summer Tomato Gratin
description: When you bake tomatoes for a very long time, as you do here, they become quite sweet.
keywords: dairy-free, halal, healthy, kosher, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, side dish, summer, tomato
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup fresh or dry bread crumbs, preferably whole wheat

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Oil a 2-quart gratin or baking dish. Layer the tomatoes in the dish, seasoning each layer with salt, pepper and a small sprinkle of sugar.

Toss together the bread crumbs, parsley and olive oil. Spread over the tomatoes in an even layer. Place in the oven, and bake for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, until the juices are thick and syrupy and the top is golden. Remove from the oven, and allow to cool for at least 15 minutes before serving.
